LayerVersionArn.description: The ARN of the layer version.

S3Bucket.description: The Amazon S3 bucket of the layer archive.

S3Key.description: The Amazon S3 key of the layer archive.

S3ObjectVersion.description: For versioned objects, the version of the layer archive object to use.

Content.description: A ZIP archive that contains the contents of an [Lambda layer](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/configuration-layers.html) .

description: The `AWS::Lambda::LayerVersion` resource creates a [Lambda layer](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/configuration-layers.html) from a ZIP archive.

CompatibleRuntimes.description: A list of compatible [function runtimes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/lambda-runtimes.html) . Used for filtering with [ListLayers](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_ListLayers.html) and [ListLayerVersions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/API_ListLayerVersions.html) .

LayerName.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.

LicenseInfo.description:
The layer's software license. It can be any of the following:

- An [SPDX license identifier](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/https://spdx.org/licenses/) . For example, `MIT` .
- The URL of a license hosted on the internet. For example, `https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT` .
- The full text of the license.
